scripts.say: So you're the new Commander? I'm surprised that you were able to find my coordinates so fast!
But it would be a shame if this exercise had never started.
Let me, the great Hornet, test your strength. Don't worry, we'll both be firing blanks!
Don't worry, I won't hurt you too badly!
Commander, air support preparation is underway. Buy us time and delay Hornet's attacks until its complete!
